name: moka_picard_v1.2
title: Moka Picard v1.2
summary: v1.2 - Run Picard Tools suite for sequence QC; MarkDuplicates(WES Only), CollectMultipleMetrics and CalculateHsMetrics. Runs dockerisedPicard Tools v2.22.8 and samtools v1.13.

inputSpec.name: sorted_bam
inputSpec.label: Sorted Mappings
inputSpec.help: An input BAM file for deduplicating and/or Picard Tools QC suites

inputSpec.name: fasta_index
inputSpec.label: Reference FASTA index archive
inputSpec.help: A gzipped tarball containing the reference genome files genome.fa, genome.fa.fai and genome.dict.

inputSpec.name: vendor_exome_bedfile
inputSpec.label: Bedfile used to calculate HS metrics
inputSpec.help: Choose the vendor exome (enrichment kit) whose coordinates will be used to calculate the selection metrics. See the app help for more information.

inputSpec.name: remove_chr
inputSpec.label: remove chr from picard intervals
inputSpec.help: removes 'chr' from bedfile file when creating interval files (used by hsmetrics and collect_targeted_pcr_metrics).

inputSpec.name: Capture_panel
inputSpec.label: Hybridisation Capture or Amplicon
inputSpec.help: Capture panels require multiple metrics/HS metrics. Amplicon capture require targetedPCRmetrics.
